definition: concise and succinct, a condensed written summary or abstract, to give essential information to someone
details:
adjective
- concise and succinct
= example: concise and succinct
- (of clothing) very short
= synonyms: abbreviated
- of short duration or distance
= example: of short duration or distance
noun
- a condensed written summary or abstract
- a document stating the facts and points of law of a client's case
= synonyms: legal brief
verb
- to give essential information to someone
= example: to give essential information to someone
